Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class GisIStreamReaderTmpl< T >

GisIStreamReaderTmpl reads items from a stream of [T].

Definition at line 27 of file IStreamReaderTmpl.h.

virtual GIS_API GisInt32 ReadNext (GisArray< T > *&buffer, const GisInt32 offset=0, const GisInt32 count=-1)=0
 Reads in the next block of items. Use ReadNext( buffer) to read in the entire stream. The caller is responsible to create/dispose the GisArray.

 Reads in the next block of items. Use ReadNext( buffer) to read in the entire stream.
